Package com.interworldtransport.cladosviewer

Class CladosCalculator

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
com.interworldtransport.cladosviewer.CladosCalculator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class CladosCalculator
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
The MonadViewer class will display Nyads and Monads and allow the user to manipulate them via methods similar to old four-function calculators
Since:
clados 1.0
Version:
0.85
Author:
Dr Alfred W Differ
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • CladosCalculator

      public CladosCalculator​(java.lang.String pTitle, java.lang.String pConfig)
      This is the main constructor the the Monad Viewer
      Parameters:
      pTitle - String This is the title string placed at the top of the viewer
      pConfig - String This is the path/filename for the configuration file for the viewer

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

    • saveSnapshot

      public void saveSnapshot​(java.lang.String pType) throws CantGetSaveException
      This method saves snapshot data to the save file.
      Parameters:
      pType - String This string alters the mode of the method allowing the use of a cached save file When it is 'null' we except the cached value from the configuration file.
      Throws:
      CantGetSaveException - This exception gets thrown when IO issues occur blocking access to writes to the save file.

    • terminateModel

      public void terminateModel()

    • getConfigProps

      protected void getConfigProps​(java.lang.String pConfName) throws CantGetIniException
      This method does the initial file handling for the configuration file. It doesn't do anything fancy... just get it and load it into IniProps.
      Parameters:
      pConfName - String This string holds the path and filename pointing to the configuration file
      Throws:
      CantGetIniException - This exception gets thrown when IO issues occur blocking access to writes to the configuration file.

    • getSaveFile

      protected void getSaveFile​(java.lang.String pSaveName) throws CantGetSaveException
      This method does the initial file handling for the snapshot save file. It doesn't do much right now except check to see if the file is there.
      Parameters:
      pSaveName - String This is the string holding the path and filename for the cached save file The method tries to read it from the configuration file.
      Throws:
      CantGetSaveException - This exception gets thrown when IO issues occur blocking access to writes to the stated save file. There might be a path issue... or a filename issue... or permissions. Who knows?
